AdmissionsPage.title: Join Our Family
AdmissionsPage.subtitle: Welcome to Our Admissions Process
AdmissionsPage.welcome: We’re delighted you’re considering Future Step Nursery for your child’s early education. Our admissions process is designed to be simple, supportive, and informative — just like the environment we strive to provide for every child.
AdmissionsPage.lookForward: We look forward to welcoming your family to our nurturing community in Al Khobar.
AdmissionsPage.seatsLimited: Limited seats available – early application is highly encouraged
AdmissionsPage.expressInterestText: Complete the short inquiry form or contact our Admissions Team to receive your personalized information packet.
AdmissionsPage.visitNurseryText: Book a private tour to explore our classrooms, meet our team, and ask any questions you may have.
AdmissionsPage.submitApplicationText: Fill out the official application online or at the school, along with required documents (e.g., ID, vaccination record, photographs).
AdmissionsPage.childSessionText: We ensure it is informal and comfortable to assess their development in a friendly manner.
AdmissionsPage.admissionDecision: Issuance of admission decision and payment of confirmation fees.
docList: Family or guardian ID card (for Saudis)
AdmissionsPage.feesText: A detailed fee schedule will be provided by the admissions team. Flexible payment plans and early payment benefits are available.
